717650.name: Next Up Hero - Soundtrack
717650.description:
Composed by David J Franco and fully remastered for the OST, the Next Up Hero soundtrack is an original album crafted the Spiral Shards and the Spoke World universe. © 2018 Digital Continue LLC, all rights reserved.

1. Hero's Call
2. Session Jam
3. Quinn of Kairos
4. Ovalia of Ellora
5. The First Hero
6. A New Hero Rises

11. Bombadil
12. Hero is Fire
13. Hero Down Below
14. Get Up Now
15. Paladrin on Piano
16. CatBomb
17. BeatDown
18. An Old Friend Returns
19. Hero Down
20. Who Made This
21. The Enemy Approaches
22. My Voice with Yours
23. Another Day at the Office
24. Hugs to My Echoes

26. A Warm Place
27. Death Defy
28. Jam of Heroes
29. The Academy Blues
30. Uncovering of Erf Volume 1
31. Uncovering of Erf Volume 2
32. Uncovering of Erf Volume 3
33. A Champion Enters
